sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionAttributeTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,AttributeTypeID,EntryOrder,Formula,IsExplicitStep, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionAttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionSubTypeID,ActionSubType,ActionTypeID,Description,SubActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionSubType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,RfVarGridStyleID,IsPITCols,IsPISNoCol,RfAttrGridStyleID,IsStepGrid,IsAttrSkipStep,ShowAttrInfoTip,UseAttrImagePicker,AttrGridContextMenu,IsPISerial,AutoGenerateSerialNo,PITSampling,MSTSampling,VAInterlace,IsExplicitHS,SampleSizeMode,OnDataCommitGoTo,IsDisableOOSWarnings,StepEditPolicy,DisableKeyboardOverride,ChainToStopped,DisplayPlan,AttrPassFailDefault,VariableSaveMode,AttrCellClick, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVDataEntryOptions WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,JobCommentLength,RfTorqueDirectionID,RfCycleEndTimeID,ThresholdTorque,RfMeasurementTypeID,RfFrequencyResponseID,UnitID,AuditAngle,CrnAdapterID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CRN_AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentTypeID,DocumentType, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DocumentType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeTypeID,GaugeType, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.GaugeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineCellID,LineID,IsPartNumber,IsWONumber,IsCustomer,IsDescription,IsHeader,IsRows,ConfigLayout,IsClickable,IsStopJob,IsStartJob,IsEditable,IsStartNextJob,IsWORef1,IsWORef2,IsWORef3,IsWorkInstruction, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkConcernRootCauseID,RootCauseID,ConcernID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernRootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIProcID,WorkInstructionProcedureID,DocumentID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkRootCauseActionID,RootCauseID,ActionID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkRootCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRMSetReqID,WorkInstructionResultID,MeasurementSetRequiredID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRMSetReq WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenancePartPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,PartID,PlannedCost,IsOptional,Quantity,UnitID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCCounterID,OPCItemID,Description,LoValue,HiValue,Scale,Offset,Formula,UnitCountTypeID,ScrapReasonID,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsProduction,AcceptableRateOfChange,RfDeltaValueModeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCCounter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ScrapID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedScrapID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,ShiftTypeID,ShiftPatternID,FromDT,ToDT,Sequence, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Shift WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartComponentID,SPCChartDefID,SPCVarChartID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartComponent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultControlLimitID,SPCChartDefID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,ModifiedDT,LoginID,ProductID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagCauseActionID,CauseActionID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,Downtime, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Job_Shift_Downtime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,ToolPosition,ToolChangeReasonID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OperationID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,MeasurementSetID,SPCChartControlLimitID,SubgroupID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarChartOC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,CustomerOrderNo,LabelsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerLayer,LayersPerInventoryPack,PackingCode,LabelTemplate,LabelColour,EANCode,CusStartNum,CusEndNum,CustomerPartNo,CustomerPartDescription,LabelText1,LabelText2,LabelText3,PrinterURL,BOMVariantID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Line.LineID, Line.Line, Line.Description, Line.LineTypeID, Line.IsRetired, Line.RfIntervalModeID, Line.IsOEEInventoryIsolation, Line.IsOEEInventoryReintroduction, Line.IsCountOutputInventory, Line.IsCountInputInventory, Line.IsLineInfoSweepEnabled, Line.IsWOOnSingleJob, Line.LineShortName, Line.CurrentLineInfoID, Line.LastLineInfoID, Line.RfInvCreatedDateModeID, Line.RfEndJobInvModeID, Line.CurrentJobID, Line.IsScrapAsQualityLoss, Line.IsScrapInProductionCounts, Line.LineDownCostPerHour, Line.IsContributeLineGroupOutput, Line.IsContributeLineGroupWaste, Line.IsContributeLineGroupDowntime, Line_.OEETarget, Line_.WasteTarget, Line_.Reference1, Line_.Reference2, Line_.Reference3, Line_.Reference4, Line_.Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM Line FULL JOIN Line_ ON (Line.LineID = Line_.LineID) FULL JOIN Line_Custom ON (Line.LineID = Line_Custom.LineID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
